Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Create an administrator context called "AdminContext" and store it in D:\OrchestraFrameworkTests\Administrator
Create a "Category0" category within the "AdminContext" context
Select the administrator mode by clicking on the "Mode" menu and selecting "Administrator"
Unfold the "AdminContext" context in the context viewer
Right click on the "Category0" category and select "Edit"

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: An "Edit category" dialog box pops up

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Fill the "Name:" textfield with "RenamedCategory"
Click on the "Finish" button

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: The "Edit category" dialog disappears. In the context viewer, the "Category0" category has been renamed to "RenamedCategory"

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Create an administrator context called "AdminContext" and store it in D:\OrchestraFrameworkTests\Administrator
Select the user mode by clicking on the "Mode" menu and selecting "User"
Create a participation to the "AdminContext" administrator context called "Participation to AdminContext"
Create a "Category0" category within the "Participation to AdminContext" context
Unfold the "Participation to AdminContext" context in the context viewer
Right click on the "Category0" category and select "Edit"

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: An "Edit category" dialog box pops up

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Fill the "Name:" textfield with "RenamedCategory"
Click on the "Finish" button

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: The "Edit category" dialog disappears. In the context viewer, the "Category0" category has been renamed to "RenamedCategory"

TestCase.TestCase_Objective: Cannot rename an administrator category in user mode

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Create an administrator context called "AdminContext" and store it in D:\OrchestraFrameworkTests\Administrator
Create a "Category0" category within the "AdminContext" context
Select the user mode by clicking on the "Mode" menu and selecting "User"
Create a participation to the "AdminContext" administrator context called "Participation to AdminContext"
Unfold the "Participation to AdminContext" context in the context viewer
Right click on the "Category0" category

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: The "Edit" entry of the contextual menu is not available

TestCase.TestCase_Title: Cannot rename an inherited category in administrator mode

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Create an administrator context called "AdminContext" and store it in D:\OrchestraFrameworkTests\Administrator
Create a "Category0" category within the "AdminContext" context
Create an administrator context called "InheritedAdminContext" with "AdminContext" as parent context and store it in D:\OrchestraFrameworkTests\Administrator
Unfold the "InheritedAdminContext" context in the context viewer
Right click on the "Category0" category of the "InherietedAdminContext" context

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: The "Edit" entry of the contextual menu is not available
